sourcesContent:
import { DefaultTheme } from 'styled-components';

export const theme: DefaultTheme = {
  bgColor: '#B5C9E9',
  textColor: '#4C5972',
  accentColor: '#cd1010',
  whiteColor: '#ffffff',
  cloudColor: '#6D7D90',
  inputStyle:
    'rgba(50, 50, 93, 0.25) 0px 2px 5px -1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 3px -1px',
  clickedStyle:
    'rgba(50, 50, 93, 0.25) 0px 15px 30px -6px inset, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 9px 18px -9px inset',
  boxShadow:
    '6px 6px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25), -4px -4px 6px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)',
};
